AUTH_001.title: Unauthorized
AUTH_001.message: Authentication is required to access this resource.
AUTH_001.description: User is not logged in or token is missing.

AUTH_002.title: Forbidden
AUTH_002.message: You do not have permission to perform this action.
AUTH_002.description: User is authenticated but lacks required role or permission.
AUTH_002.action: Check user role or access policy.

AUTH_003.title: Session Expired
AUTH_003.message: Your session has expired. Please login again.
AUTH_003.description: JWT or session token is expired or invalid.
AUTH_003.action: Force logout and redirect to login.

VAL_001.title: Validation Error
VAL_001.description: One or more fields failed validation rules.
VAL_001.action: Highlight invalid fields and show validation message.

VAL_002.title: Missing Required Field
VAL_002.description: Mandatory field was not sent in request.
VAL_002.action: Ensure all required fields are sent.

DATA_001.title: Data Not Found
DATA_001.action: Verify request parameters or show empty state.

DATA_002.title: Duplicate Data
DATA_002.action: Ask user to use different value.

SRV_001.title: Internal Server Error
SRV_001.message: Something went wrong on the server.
